ReportVariable.Name: BegBalance
ReportVariable.ValueExpr: =$BegBalance +#010;IIF(CStr($PrevBranchID) + CStr($PrevSubID) + CStr($PrevFinPeriodID) <> CStr([GLHistoryByPeriod.BranchID]) + CStr([GLHistoryByPeriod.SubID]) + CStr([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID]) And [GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID] = [@StartPeriod],#010; IIF((([Account.Type] = 'I' Or [Account.Type] = 'E') And Payments.ArePeriodsInSameYear([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID.Raw],[GLHistoryByPeriod.LastActivityPeriod.Raw])) Or ([Account.Type] = 'A' Or [Account.Type] = 'L'), #010; IIF([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID] = [GLHistoryByPeriod.LastActivityPeriod], #010; IsNull([HistoryLast.FinBegBalance], 0),#010; IsNull([HistoryLast.FinYtdBalance], 0)#010; ),#010; 0#010; )#010; , 0#010;)

ReportVariable.Name: BegCuryBalance
ReportVariable.ValueExpr: = $BegCuryBalance + #010;IIF#010;( CStr($PrevBranchID) + CStr($PrevSubID) + CStr($PrevFinPeriodID) <>#010; CStr([GLHistoryByPeriod.BranchID]) + CStr([GLHistoryByPeriod.SubID]) + CStr([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID])#010; And [GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID] = [@StartPeriod],#010; IIF#010; ( (([Account.Type] = 'I' Or [Account.Type] = 'E') And Payments.ArePeriodsInSameYear([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID.Raw],[GLHistoryByPeriod.LastActivityPeriod.Raw])) #010; Or ([Account.Type] = 'A' Or [Account.Type] = 'L'),#010; IIF#010; ( [GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID] = [GLHistoryByPeriod.LastActivityPeriod], #010; IsNull([HistoryLast.CuryFinBegBalance], 0),#010; IsNull([HistoryLast.CuryFinYtdBalance], 0)#010; )#010; , 0#010; )#010; , 0#010;)#010;#010;

ReportVariable.Name: PrevFinPeriodID
ReportVariable.ValueExpr: =CStr([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID]) /* need to do CStr here, because of done only in BegBalance calc formula, results in having hyphens delimiting segments of period/branch/sub keys */

ReportVariable.Name: LineBalance
ReportVariable.ValueExpr: =$LineBalance + $SignTurn * IsNull(iif((@IncludeReclassified = False) And ([GLTran.DebitAmt] > 0 = True) And ([GLTran.ReclassRemainingAmt] > 0 = True), [GLTran.ReclassRemainingAmt], [GLTran.DebitAmt]), 0) - $SignTurn * IsNull(iif((@IncludeReclassified = False) And ([GLTran.CreditAmt] > 0 = True) And ([GLTran.ReclassRemainingAmt] > 0 = True), [GLTran.ReclassRemainingAmt], [GLTran.CreditAmt]), 0)

ReportVariable.Name: LineCuryBalance
ReportVariable.ValueExpr: =$LineCuryBalance + $SignTurn * IsNull(iif((@IncludeReclassified = False) And ([GLTran.CuryDebitAmt] > 0 = True) And ([GLTran.CuryReclassRemainingAmt] > 0 = True), [GLTran.CuryReclassRemainingAmt], IIf([GLTran.UOM] = 'YY', [LSLedgerSettlement.OrigDebitAmt] - [LSLedgerSettlement.SettledDebitAmt], [GLTran.CuryDebitAmt])), 0) - $SignTurn * IsNull(iif((@IncludeReclassified = False) And ([GLTran.CuryCreditAmt] > 0 = True) And ([GLTran.CuryReclassRemainingAmt] > 0 = True), [GLTran.CuryReclassRemainingAmt], IIf([GLTran.UOM] = 'YY', [LSLedgerSettlement.OrigCreditAmt] - [LSLedgerSettlement.SettledCreditAmt], [GLTran.CuryCreditAmt])), 0)

TextBox.Name: textBox48
TextBox.Value: =iif((@IncludeReclassified = False) And ([GLTran.CuryDebitAmt] > 0 = True) And ([GLTran.CuryReclassRemainingAmt] > 0 = True), [GLTran.CuryReclassRemainingAmt], IIf([GLTran.UOM] = 'YY', [LSLedgerSettlement.OrigDebitAmt] - [LSLedgerSettlement.SettledDebitAmt], [GLTran.CuryDebitAmt]))

TextBox.Name: textBox56
TextBox.Value: =iif((@IncludeReclassified = False) And ([GLTran.CuryCreditAmt] > 0 = True) And ([GLTran.CuryReclassRemainingAmt] > 0 = True), [GLTran.CuryReclassRemainingAmt], IIf([GLTran.UOM] = 'YY', [LSLedgerSettlement.OrigCreditAmt] - [LSLedgerSettlement.SettledCreditAmt],[GLTran.CuryCreditAmt]))

Header.Name: groupHeaderSection1
Header.VisibleExpr: = IIF( [@Module] = null,#010; IIF (#010; ([Account.Type] = 'I' or [Account.Type] = 'E' ) and Not(Payments.ArePeriodsInSameYear(Prev([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID.Raw]), [GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID.Raw]))#010; or Prev([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID]) = null#010; , True, False)#010;, True)

Header.Name: groupHeaderSection2
Header.VisibleExpr: = IIF ([@Module] = null,#010;#010;IIF (#010; (([Account.Type] = 'I' or [Account.Type] = 'E' ) and Not(Payments.ArePeriodsInSameYear(Prev([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID.Raw]), [GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID.Raw]))#010; or Prev([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID]) = null) and [@Multicurrency] = 1 and [Account.CuryID] <> null And [Ledger.BaseCuryID]<>[Account.CuryID]#010; , True, False)#010;, IIF( [@Multicurrency] = 1 and [Account.CuryID] <> null And [Ledger.BaseCuryID]<>[Account.CuryID],#010; True, False)#010;)

Footer.Name: groupFooterSection1
Footer.VisibleExpr: = IIF([@Module] = null,#010;#010; IIF (#010; ([Account.Type] = 'I' or [Account.Type] = 'E' ) and Not(Payments.ArePeriodsInSameYear(Next([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID.Raw]),[GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID.Raw]))#010; or Next([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID]) = null #010; , True, False)#010;, True)

TextBox.Name: textBox51
TextBox.Value: = IIF( [@Module] = null, #010;IIF (Next([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID.Raw]) = null, 'Account Total:', Left([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID.Raw],4) + ' Total:')#010;, [GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID] + ' Total:')

Footer.Name: groupFooterSection2
Footer.VisibleExpr: = IIF ( [@Module] = null, #010;IIF (#010; ( ([Account.Type] = 'I' or [Account.Type] = 'E' ) and Not(Payments.ArePeriodsInSameYear(Next([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID.Raw]), [GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID.Raw]))#010; or Next([GLHistoryByPeriod.FinPeriodID]) = null ) and [@Multicurrency] = 1 and [Account.CuryID] <> null And [Ledger.BaseCuryID]<>[Account.CuryID]#010; , True, False)#010;, #010;IIF ( [@Multicurrency] = 1 and [Account.CuryID] <> null And [Ledger.BaseCuryID]<>[Account.CuryID], True, False)#010;)
